name: Pen to Print - Handwriting OCR
description: Handwriting Recognition OCR - Convert scanned handwritten notes into editable text.

parameters.name: includeSubScan
parameters.description: integer [0/1] indicate whether the return value should include images of the split lines.

parameters.name: srcImg
parameters.description: file object of the image (jpg or png format) to be scanned.

parameters.name: Session
parameters.description: GUID string to represent the session. Will appear in billing for tracking purposes.

utterances.utterance: Convert this handwritten note into editable text.
Extract text from this scanned handwritten document and include images of the split lines.
Recognize the text in this image of handwritten notes.
Convert this handwritten letter into digital text and track the session with ID '12345'.
Extract text from this scanned handwritten form without including split line images.
Convert this handwritten recipe into editable text and include the split line images.
Recognize the text in this handwritten journal entry.
Extract text from this scanned handwritten note and track the session with ID '67890'.
Convert this handwritten list into digital text.
Recognize the text in this handwritten letter and include images of the split lines.
